Synergists: Clavicular (Upper) Pectoralis Major, Anterior Deltoid, Triceps Brachii, Iliopsoas, Tensor Fasciae Latae, Rectus Femoris, Gluteus Maximus, Gluteus Medius, Gluteus Minimus
Important stabilizers of supporting leg: Iliopsoas, Tensor Fasciae Latae, Sartorius, Quadriceps, Internal and External Obliques
name: Spiderman push-up
